8 #ifndef IFACE_MEASURE_H_
9 #define IFACE_MEASURE_H_
10 
11 
12 #include <hwpl/types.h>
13 
14 enum {
15  MEASURE_I_LED,
16  MEASURE_V_LED,
17  MEASURE_TEMP_LED,
18  MEASURE_BATT_CHG0,
19  MEASURE_BATT_CHG1,
20  MEASURE_V_MAIN,
21  MEASURE_V_BATT,
22  MEASURE_I_BATT,
23  MEASURE_LIGHT
24 };
25 
26 typedef struct {
27  u16 iled;
28  u16 vled;
29  u16 tled;
30  u16 bat_chg[2];
31  u16 vbat[2];
32  u16 ibat;
33  u16 light;
34 } measure_t;
35 
36 typedef struct {
37  u16 mask;
38  u16 samples;
39 } measure_attr_t;
40 
41 enum {
42  MEASURE_REQUEST_READ,
43  MEASURE_REQUEST_SET_ATTR,
44  MEASURE_REQUEST_TOTAL
45 };

47 #endif /* IFACE_MEASURE_H_ */
